scan_table_check.description: In general, an advanced busiess rule will wrap your code in a function, and it is important that this guideline is followed. When code is not enclosed in a function, variable and other objects are avilable to all other server-side scripts. This availability can lead to unexpected consequences that are difficult to troubleshoot.
scan_table_check.name: Always keep code/snippet in functions - Business Rules
scan_table_check.resolution_details: If you have already written code without function in any business rule, move the code by having the function. If you create any new business rule, please ensure to write code inside of a function rather writing it directly in script field.
scan_table_check.short_description: Keep code in functions - Business Rules
scan_table_check.sys_name: Always keep code/snippet in functions - Business Rules
